Description[ | ]

The 4x4 Truck is a type of vehicle in 7 Days to Die. The radial menu may be accessed by holding <E> over the vehicle. In Multiplayer the 4x4 Truck can have a passenger, making it a 2 player vehicle. The 4x4 Truck is the definitive late game vehicle (with only the end-game Gyrocopter beating it). It hosts an exceptional 81 storage slots making it close to a portable base in terms of item capacity.

Speed[ | ]

The 4x4 truck travels at 9 block/s without shift, and 14 blocks/s with shift. For reference the default player speed with 100% mobility (i.e unencumbered with no armor penalties) is 7 blocks/s while sprinting and 3.5 while walking.

Recommended Mods[ | ]

Image Name Affected Part Description Vehicle Reserve Fuel Tank Mod Fuel Tank Increases fuel tank capacity. Vehicle Off Road Highlights Mod Light Increase Headlight's Strength. Vehicle Expanded Seating Mod Seat Double Available Vehicle Seats

Operation / Controls[ | ]

Mouse ← - Steer left

Mouse → - Steer right

W - Throttle (move forward)

S - Brake (stop) / Reverse

SPACEBAR - Handbrake (quick stop)

F - Toggle Headlight On/Off

E - Mount/Dismount.

Hold E to bring up the radial menu. Radial menu actions include: Drive, Access info panel, Access storage, Refuel, Repair, Honk horn, Lock/Unlock, Set Pincode and the option 'Take' which puts vehicle back in inventory.

X - Honk horn

Shift - Sprint

Left Click - Changes the steering to keyboard control. A to steer left D to steer right.
